name: Mozzarella Cheese
description: Made by some Stromboli cousins, from a recipe that has been in the family for centuries. This cheese is elastic in texture and has a nutty flavour.

name: Pepperoni
description: The finest pork and beef are used as ingredients in this spicy, tart meat product. Few pepperonis in the world can compete.

name: Anchovies
description: Anchovies sometimes get a bad rap. These are different Stromboli buyers wait at the docks to purchase only the tastiest, freshest little fish. Only lightly salted.

name: White Mushroom
description: The simple, clean taste of this common mushroom brings out the deep flavors of Stromboli pizza.

name: Black Olive
description: These delicious olives are brine-cured and hand-pitted to ensure the best taste. They are grown in Italy in an orchard planted by Stromboli ancestors more than 300 years ago.

name: Meatball
description: A round, springy, delicately seasoned meatball made just the way Mama Stromboli always made them. Covered with tangy marinara sauce.

name: Shrimp
description: Hand-caught Louisiana shrimp are peeled, cooked, and delicately seasoned specifically for use as a pizza topping.

name: Pineapple
description: This golden Pineapple is sweet, succulent, and juicy. No pineapple lover will be able to resist it.

name: Bacon
description: Rich, smoky bacon a traditional pizza topping favorite. Made from the freshest of pork bellies.

name: Chicken Wing
description: Chicken wings dipped in our special Stromboli family batter and then lightly fried (bone-free).

name: Donut
description: Donut miss out on this odd, but tasty piza topping! Fat, sugar, pizza - the ideal late-night snack, all in one.

name: Banana
description: Slices of plain banana, lightly toasted and sprinkled on top of the pizza. These bananas are seed-free!

name: Fake Krab
description: Minced fish paste is flavored with essence of crab and then formed into pieces of crab meat. You'd never know it wasn't a real thing.

name: Peanut
description: Plain boiled peanuts, slightly chewy. Think of them as a protein boost.

name: Ice Cube
description: Purified local tap water is frozen into miniature ice cubes for this topping.

name: Fried Egg
description: Suitable on a breakfast pizza - at any hour. A basic fried chicken egg.

name: Mystery Meat Sausage
description: Made by school cafeterias, the world's only known source of mystery meat.

name: Caviar
description: Fish eggs. For those who enjoy a fishy, salty flavour without the crunch of tiny anchovy bones.

name: Chocolate Bar
description: Pieces of milk chocolate. For the choco-pizza-holic.

name: Eggplant
description: Roasted slices of glossy purple eggplant have a rich flavor.

name: Lobster
description: Tender white lobster meat and a butter/garlic sauce sprinkle this pizza. Mmm!

name: Black Bean
description: A fresh, beany taste. Good for those on a high protein diet.

name: French Fries
description: Fried potato wedges and a sprinkling of ketchup.

name: Roquefort Cheese
description: A stinky cheese streaked with green. You'll eiher love it or hate it.

name: Taco
description: Beef, beans, sour cream, salsa, lettuce, and a broken up tortilla shell Olel.

name: Pumpkin
description: Sliced sugar pumpkin makes a surprisingly tasty topping.
